knimeNode.name: Sample and Expand Vector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Samples and expands the Double Vector to individual double columns.

intro.p: This node samples and splits the Double Vector to double columns.
The Bit Vector Generator node generates some position and name information as metadata. You can use that information in this node.

tab.name: Standard Options
tab.option: The column containing the bit vectors
Should we remove the selected bit vector column?
The available names are used instead of the generated if possible.
New column names start with this prefix.

option.name: Start index for the first new column

tab.option: The numeric part of the column will start from this index.
The values after this index in the bit vector will be omitted from the output table.

ports.inPort: Table containing at least one double vector column.
ports.outPort: Table with list of sampled columns.
